description: This file defines the main UI page for the notes application, implementing a home screen with bottom navigation to switch between notes list and tags, along with associated widgets and interactions.

classes.name: HomePage
classes.description: Main page widget with bottom navigation for notes and tags.

classes.name: _HomePageState
classes.description: State class managing the bottom navigation index and building the HomePage.

classes.name: _NotesTab
classes.description: Widget displaying the list of notes, including refresh and add functionalities.

classes.name: _TagsTab
classes.description: Widget displaying the list of tags or messages when no tags are available.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state for the HomePage widget.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the HomePage, including navigation, app bar, and tabs.

methods.name: _NotesTab
methods.description: Constructs the notes list view, handles loading and empty states.

methods.name: _TagsTab
methods.description: Constructs the tags list view or empty state message.
